entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing early this evening. Fog patches developing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing rain late in the evening and after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
